extendedInfo.description: This is an unofficial application for UQ students of all campuses.Features:* UQRota integration (with offline caching) for immediate access to your timetable* Bachelor of Serendipity - gives you a list of 10 random lectures currently happening at your closest campus.* Live floor plans with computer availability for all major and most minor UQ Libraries around Queensland* Live computer availabiltity overviews for UQ Library and EAIT labs* Live bus and train information for:** Chancellor's Place Buses** UQ Lakes Buses** Toowong Trains** UQ Ipswich Buses** Ipswich Trains** RCH Herston Buses** Gatton (Warrego Hwy) Buses* Class timetable lookups (input your course code, get a timetable for any day)* Reverse Timetable Lookup (AKA What's In There), allows you to get a timetable of usage for any room in any of the three largest UQ campuses---------------Check out what our happy customers are saying!"Defs worth the $3" - some guy on Stalkerspace."UQRota integration is very nice" - some other guy on Stalkerspace"Officially the first app I have ever paid for. Works fantastically." - yet another guy on Stalkerspace

reviews.title: Beaut
reviews.comment: Classic case of amazing students making things a bit easier for the rest of us. Thanks a bunch for the app.
reviews.author: Jonathan Siu

reviews.title: Nailed it
reviews.comment: Excellent gui, easy viewing of all the available services and having them all in one place is well worth the small fee. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Mitchell Fullelove

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Big thumbs up, absolutely love it. So useful to have.
reviews.author: Blake Phillips

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says it does,  great app,  really handy
reviews.author: Chris Purcell

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: This app does what it sets out to do very well. It is an easy way of viewing your timetable on your phone, and being able to see computer availability certainly saves time looking around for a free computer. It also makes it quick and easy to check what time your next bus is leaving the uni.
reviews.author: Aaron Boshammer

reviews.title: Worth the $3
reviews.comment: Great for checking class and bus timetables. Love how easy it is to see the class location. A few problems with the Samsung Galaxy, but still very useful. Thanks!!
reviews.author: Emily Mayes
